author: Alieza Durana and Matthew Desmond, The Washington Post
title: Massive wave of evictions coming...
description: Before the novel coronavirus struck, 300,000 evictions were filed in the United States in a typical month. With nearly 10 million people filing unemployment claims last month, evictions would clearly skyrocket, absent intervention from the government. In one …
content:
Jill Ferguson, 66 stands for a portrait with a eviction notice at her home last month in West Allis Wis.
Jill Ferguson, 66 stands for a portrait with a eviction notice at her home last month in West Allis Wis.
